name: Rise of the Triad
summary: Apogee Software and Interceptor Entertainment proudly present the rebirth of the cult-classic first-person shooter, “Rise of the Triad”. Bigger, better and more ludicrous than ever before. The H.U.N.T returns with a full single-player campaign, a fully featured multiplayer experience and so much more.
info:
• 中文名: 龙霸三合会
  • 别名: Rise of the Triad 2013
  • 别名: Rise of the Triad: Remake
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 3
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2013年7月31日
  • 开发: Interceptor Entertainment
  • 发行: Apogee Software, LLC (Apogee Entertainment)
